Games.name: Uraren Blocky
Games.linesOfCode1: Tefriḍ aswir-agi s 1 n izirig n JavaScript:
Games.linesOfCode2: Tefriḍ aswir-agi s %1 n izirig n JavaScript:
Games.resetTooltip: Seḥbes ahil sakin ales awennez n uswir.
Games.hashError: Suref-aɣ, %1 ur imenṭaf ula d yiwen seg wahilen yettwaskelsen.
Games.xmlError: Ur izmir ara ad isnifel afaylu n usekles. Ahat yettwarna s lqem-nniḍen n Blockly?
Games.submitted: Tanemmirt ɣef wahil-a! Ma tḥemmel-it terbeɛt-nneɣ n yibkan, ad t-id-suffɣen di tmidelt akka sin wussan.
Games.breakLink: Ticki tebdiḍ asnifel n JavaScript, tzemreḍ ad tuɣaleḍ ar teẓrigt n iḥedran. Yelha waya?
Games.helpAbort: Aswir-agi yewɛer aṭas. Tebɣiḍ ad tzegleḍ-t sakin ad tedduḍ ar uswir d -iteddun? Tzemrem yal tikelt ad d-uɣaleḍ ɣur-s.
Index.subTitle: Uraren i uzekka n umsihel.
Puzzle.error1: Qrib! Al yiwen n iḥder ur yellin d ameɣtu.
Puzzle.tryAgain: Iḥder s ubruṛeq mačči d ameɣtu. Ɛreḍ tikelt-nniḍen.
Puzzle.helpText: I yal aɣersiw (azegzaw), senteḍ tugna-is s ufran n wuṭṭun n iḍarren-is, sakin sers ayen ixeddem awal ɣef wawal.
Maze.moveForwardTooltip: Saz amyurar s yiwen n umkan.
Maze.turnTooltip: Zzi amyurar s aezlmaḍ nes s ayeffus s 90 n ntfesniwin.
Maze.ifTooltip: Ma yella yiwen n ubrid deg tnilla d'ittunefken, eg tigawin-agi.
Maze.ifelseTooltip: Ma yella yiwen n ubrid deg tnilla d-tittunefken, eg tigawin n iḥder amezwaru. Ma ulac eg tigawin n iḥder wis sin.
Maze.whileTooltip: Ales iḥedran n ugensu arama yewweḍ iswi.
Maze.runTooltip: Err amyurar ad yeg ayen i d-qqaren iḥedran.
Maze.resetTooltip: Sers amyurar di tazwara n tzibba
Maze.helpStack: Asembibb lwaḥid n sin iḥedran n tinadin ad 'isaẓ' ar zdat akken ad d-imudd tallelt ad awḍeɣ iswi.
Maze.helpOneTopBlock: Deg uswir-agi, tesriḍ ad tsembibbeḍ iḥedran wa ɣef wa nnig n wiyaḍ eg temnaṭ tamellalt n umahil.
Maze.helpRun: Selkem ahil-ik akken ad twalid ayen  iḍerrun.
Maze.helpReset:
Ahil-ik ur yefri ara tazibba.
Senned ɣef 'Ales awennez' sakin ɛreḍ tikelt-nniḍen.
Maze.helpRepeat:
Seqdec kan sin n iḥedran akken ad tawḍeḍ iswi.
Seqdec iḥder 'ales' akken ad tselkmeḍ iḥder ugar n tikelt.
Maze.helpCapacity: Tesqedceḍ akk iḥedran deg uswir-agi. Akken ad ternuḍ iḥder amaynut, yessef ad tekkseḍ iḥder yellan.
Maze.helpRepeatMany: Tzermeḍ ad terreḍ ugar n yiwen n yiḥder ar yiḥder "ales".
Maze.helpIf: Iḥder 'ma' ad iselkem ayen yellan daxel-is ma yella tawtilit d tidettit. Ad yeɛreḍ ad yezzi s azelmaḍ ma yella ubrid azelmaḍ.
Maze.helpMenu: Sit ɣef %1 deg iḥder 'ma' akken ad tbeddleḍ tawtilt-is.
Maze.helpWallFollow:
Tzemreḍ ad tefruḍ tazibba-agi iweɛren?
Ɛreḍ ad tḍefreḍ aɣrab seg idis n ufus-ik azelmaḍ. I yimsihal-kan imusnawen.
Bird.heading: iɣef
Bird.noWormTooltip: Addad ticki agḍiḍ ur d-yeṭṭif ara ijermed.
Bird.headingTooltip: Ddu di tnila n teɣmert yettunefken. 0 deg uzelmaḍ, 90 deg udem, atg.
Bird.positionTooltip: x akked y mmalen-d adig n ugḍiḍ. Ticki x = 0 agḍiḍ ad yili di rrif azelmaḍ, ticki x = 100 ad yili di rrif ayeffus. Ticki y = 0 agḍiḍ ad yili ukesser, ticki y = 100 ad yili ukessawen.
Bird.helpHeading: Beddel tiɣmert n uqerru akken agḍiḍ ad d-yeṭṭef ijermeḍ sakin ad yerṣ ɣef lɛec-is.
Bird.helpHasWorm: Seqdec iḥder-agi akken ad tedduḍ ar tnila ma ɣur-k ijermeḍ, sakin dar tnila-nniḍen mayella ulac.
Bird.helpX: 'x' d adig-ik aglawan. Seqdec iḥder-agi akken ad tedduḍ di tnila ma yella 'x' yezga-d ddwa n n umiḍan, di tnila-nniḍen ma yugar-it.
Bird.helpElse: Senned ɣef tignit akken ad tesnifled iḥder 'ma'.
Bird.helpElseIf: Aswir-agi yesra lwaḥid iḥder 'ma' akked iḥder 'ma ulac'.
Bird.helpAnd: Iḥder 'akked' d idetti ma yella sin n inekcam d idettiyen.
Turtle.moveTooltip: Awi afekrun ar zdatneq ar deffir n tesmekta yettwammlen.
Turtle.turnTooltip: Zzi afekrun s azelmaḍ neɣ s ayeffus s umḍan n tfesniwin d-ittunefken.
Turtle.penTooltip: Rfed neɣ sers imru, akken ad tesḥebseḍ neɣ ad tkemmleḍ asuneɣ.
Turtle.turtleVisibilityTooltip: Ad yerr afekrun (tawinest neɣ aneccab) ad yettban neɣ ala.
Turtle.printTooltip: Ad isuneɣ aḍris s tnilla n ufekrun deg wadig-is.
Turtle.fontTooltip: Ad isbadu tasefsit iseqdac iḥder n tira.
Turtle.submitDisabled: Ad iselkem ahil arama yeḥbes. Sakin ad tizmired ad tessuffɣeḍ unuɣ-ik di tmidelt.
Turtle.helpUseLoop: Tifrat-ik tetteddu, acu kan tzemreḍ ad teggeḍ ugar.
Turtle.helpUseLoop3: Ad isuneɣ talɣa s kraḍ kan n iḥedran.
Turtle.helpUseLoop4: Ad isuneɣ itri s kuẓ kan n iḥedran.
Turtle.helpText2: Ad ibeddel ahil-ik akken ad isuneɣ asemmusdis deg umḍiq n umkuẓ.
Turtle.helpText3a: Wagi d iḥder amaynut ara k-yeǧǧen ad tbeddleḍ ini.
Turtle.helpText4a: Wagi d iḥder amaynut ara k-yeǧǧen ad trefdeḍ akeryun-ik n tferkit ticki tleḥḥuḍ.
Turtle.helpText4b: Suneɣ itri awraɣ, sakin suneɣ ajerriḍ nnig-s.
Turtle.helpText5: Deg umḍiq n yiwen n yitri, tzemreḍ ad sunɣeḍ kraḍ n yitran yettwasersen am umkuẓ?
Turtle.helpText6: Ad isuneɣ kraḍ n yitran iwraɣen, akked izirig amellal.
Turtle.helpText7: Suneɣ itran iwraɣen, sakin kuẓ n ijerriḍen imellalen?
Turtle.helpText8: Suneɣ 360 n izirigen imellalen yettemcabin ar waggur yeččuren.
Turtle.helpText9: Tzemreḍ ad ternuḍ tawinest taberkant akken aggur ad yuɣal razzirt?
Turtle.helpText10: Suneɣ ayen tebɣiḍ. Ɣur-k ddeqs n iḥedran ara twaliḍ. Zhu!
Turtle.helpText10Reddit: Seqdec taqeffalt  "Wali timdelt" akken ad twaliḍ unuɣen i gan wiyaḍ. Ma yella terniḍ unuɣen yelhan, seqdec taqeffalt "Suffeɣ-d di tmidelt" akken ad t-id-suffɣeḍ.
Turtle.helpToolbox: Fren taggayt akked ad twaliḍ iḥedran.
Movie.circleTooltip: Ad isuneɣ tawinest deg umḍiq akked waqqar d-ittunefken.
Movie.rectTooltip: Ad isuneɣ asrem deg umḍiq d-ittunefken s tehri akked teɣzi yettunefken.
Movie.lineTooltip: Ad isuneɣ izirig seg yiwet n tneqqiḍt ar tayeḍ s tuzert d-ittenefken.
Movie.timeTooltip: Ad d-yerr tanzagt tamirant n umray (0-100).
Movie.submitDisabled: Amray-ik ur yettḥerrik ara. Seqdec iḥedran akken ad tegeḍ kra n wayen yelhan. Sakin ad tizmireḍ ad tessuffɣeḍ amray-ik di tmidelt.
Movie.helpText1: Seqdec tilɣiwin tiḥerfiyin akken ad tseunɣeḍ amdan-agi.
Movie.helpText2a: Aswir-agi d asaru. Tebɣiḍ ad tawiḍ iɣil n umdan deg ugdil. Senned ɣef tqeffalt n tɣuri akken ad twaliḍ taskant.
Movie.helpText2b: Ticki amray neɣ asaru iteddu, azal n yiḥder 'akud' ad yettaẓ si 0 ar 100. Imi tebɣiḍ d akken adig aglawan n ččir azeggaɣ ad yebdu si 0 sakin ad yeddu arama 100, ayagi d ayen fessusen.
Movie.helpText3: Iḥder 'akud' ad yeddu seg 0 arama d 100. Maca tura tebɣiḍ d akken adig aglawan n ččir ad yebdu seg 100 aram d 0. Tzemreḍ ad tafeḍ tanfalit n tusnakt ara yettin tanila?
Movie.helpText4: Seqdec ayen tlemdeḍ deg uswir yezrin akken ad tsedduḍ kuẓ n takurin tizegzawin di kuẓ n tiniliwin.
Movie.helpText5: Aḥerrek n uqerru n tɣerdayt d ayen fessusen. Tzemreḍ ad tsiḍneḍ ula d wamek ara tḥerkeḍ imezzuɣen?
Movie.helpText6: Sin n izirigen iḥerfiyen. Af-d kan ayen tegen ixfawen n izirigen.
Movie.helpText7: Tanfalit n tusnakt i ččir-agi ara d-yeɣlin tewɛeṛ. Hatt-ayen tririt.
Movie.helpText8: Seqdec iḥder 'ma' akken ad tsunɣeḍ ččir azeggaɣ akked unili i uzgen amezwaru n umray. Sakin, suneɣ ččir azegzaw i uzgen wis sin.
Movie.helpText9: Tzemreḍ ad tegged ččir yeṭṭafaṛen tinelli? Tinelli tettwasuɣen i kečč. Ticki tzemreḍ ad teggeḍ aya, ad tizmireḍ ad teggeḍ ayen tebɣiḍ.
Movie.helpText10: Suneɣ amray tebɣiḍ. Ɣur-k ddeqs n iḥedran ara twaliḍ. Zhu!
Movie.helpText10Reddit: Seqdec taqeffalt  "Wali timdelt" akken ad twaliḍ imrayen i gan wiyaḍ. Ma yella terniḍ imrayen yelhan, seqdec taqeffalt "Suffeɣ-d di tmidelt" akken ad -t-id-suffɣeḍ.
Music.playNoteTooltip: Urar tazmili n uẓawan n tenzagt akked uwrir n yisefka.
Music.setInstrumentTooltip: Ddu ar wallal i d-ituunefken s wurar n tezmilin tiẓawanin yeṭṭafaren.
Music.startTooltip: Ad yesselkem iḥedran degugensu ticki taqeffalt "Senker ahil" tettusenned.
Music.submitDisabled: Ad iselkem ahil arama yeḥbes. Sakin ad tizmired ad tessuffɣeḍ azaɛan-ik di tmidelt.
Music.helpUseFunctions: Tifrat-ik tetteddu, maca tzemreḍ ad txedmeḍ ugar. Seqdec tiwuriwin akken ad tesneɣseḍ tasmekta n tengalt yettwalsen.
Music.helpText1: Suddes kraḍ n tizmilin timezwura n 'Frère Jacques'.
Music.helpText2a: 'tawuri' ad k-teǧǧ ad tesdukleḍ iḥedran, sakin ad ten-tsellekmeḍ deg yiwet n tikelt.
Music.helpText2b: Rnu tawuri akken ad turareḍ kraḍ n tizmilin timezwura n 'Frère Jacques'. Senker tawuri-agi snat n tikalt. Ur rennu ara iḥedran-nniḍen n tizmilin.
Music.helpText3: Rnu tawuri tis snat i yiḥder n 'Frère Jacques'. Tazmilt taneggarut meqqert ugar.
Music.helpText4: Rnu tawuri tis kraḍ i yiḥder yeṭṭafaṛen 'Frère Jacques'. Kuẓ timezwura n tizmilin weizzilit ugar.<x id='START_BREAK'/><x id='START_IMAGE'/>
Music.helpText6a: Iḥder-agi amaynut ad k-yeǧǧ ad tedduḍ ar wallal-nniḍen.
Music.helpText7a: Iḥder-agi amaynut a dyernu akud n tsusmi.
Music.helpText7b: Rnu g̱hder wis sin yesɛan iḥder n tsusmi, sakin urar daɣen 'Frère Jacques'.
Music.helpText8: Yal iḥder n beddu yessefk ad yurar 'Frère Jacques' snat n tikal.
Music.helpText9: Rnu kuẓ n yiḥedran n beddu anida yal yiwen ad yurar 'Frère Jacques' snat n tikal. rnu amḍan iwatan n yiḥedran n tsusmi.
Music.helpText10: Suddes ayen tebɣiḍ. Ɣur-k ddeqs n iḥedran imaynuten ara twaliḍ. Zhu!
Music.helpText10Reddit: Seqdec taqeffalt  "Wali timdelt" akken ad twaliḍ ayen i suddsen wiyaḍ. Ma yella terniḍ ayen yelhan, seqdec taqeffalt "Suffeɣ-d deg tmidelt" akken ad t-id-suffɣeḍ.
Pond.scanTooltip: Nadi icenga. Mudd tanila (0-360). Ad d-yerr ameccaq n ucengu iqerben di tnila. Ad d-yerr ifeḍ ma ulac ula d yiwen n ucengu.
Pond.cannonTooltip: Wwet s umrud. Mudd tanila (0-360) akked talast tafellayt n umeccaq (0-70).
Pond.stopTooltip: Seḥes ardab. Amyurar ad isenɣeṣ arured akken ad yeḥbes.
Pond.healthTooltip: Ad d-yerr tazmert tamirant n umyurar (0 yemmut, 100 yeǧǧhedd aṭas).
Pond.speedTooltip: Ad d-yerr arured amiran n umyurar (0 yeḥbes, 100 yettazzal aṭas).
Pond.locXTooltip: Ad d-yerr amsideg X n umyurar (0 d rrif azelmaḍ, 100 d rrif ayeffus).
Pond.locYTooltip: Ad d-yerr amsideg y n umyurar (0 d rrif n ukesser, 100 d rrif n usawen).
Pond.helpUseScan: Tifrat-ik tetteddu, acu kan tzemreḍ ad tegeḍ ugar. Seqdec 'scan' akken ad temmleḍ i umrud ameccaq ansa ara yewwet.
Pond.helpText1: Seqdec taladna 'cannon' akken ad tḥazeḍ asaḍas. Aɣewwaṛ amezwaru n tiɣmert, wis sin d ameccaq. Af-d tuddsa iwatan.
Pond.helpText2: Asaḍas-agi yessefk ad yettuḥaz ddeqs n tikal. Seqdec tineddict 'while (true)' akken ad tegeḍ taɣawsa s wudem ifed.
Pond.helpText3a: Afna-agi yettaẓ yettuɣal, ayen ara t-yerren yewɛeṛ iakken ad tḥazeḍ-t. Tanfalit 'scan' ad terr ameccaq yellan deg tnila yettunefken.
Pond.helpText3b: Talast-agi tafellayt n umeccaq d ayen tesra tladna 'cannon' akken ad tewwet s tseddi.
Pond.helpText4: Afna-agi yebɛed aṭas akken ad tesqedceḍ amrud (ibeɛden arama d 70 n ikilumitren). Deg umḍiq-is, seqdec taladna 'swim' akken ad tebduḍ ardab ar ufna akkenad tḥazeḍ-t.
Pond.helpText5: Afna-agi yebɛed aṭas akken ad tesqedceḍ amrud. Maca, ur tezmireḍ ara i umyewwat. Rdeb ar ufna skud adig-ik aglawan yekka-d ddaw n 50. Ihi 'stop' sakin seqdec amrud.
Pond.helpText6: Afna-agi ad ireggel ticki tḥuzaḍ-t. Rdeb ɣur-s ma yella yebɛed ugar n talast (70 n ikilumitren).
